channel_description: Groudon, Kyogre, the Grand Festival, the Hoenn League—what DOESN’T Ash deal with in the eighth season of Pokémon the Series? See it now on Pokémon TV!

media.description: Our heroes reconnect with an unlucky Spoink, and it's still having trouble holding onto its pearl!
media.title: Clamperl of Wisdom

media.description: Ash and friends join a treasure hunter to explore the deep sea, but Team Rocket is right behind them!
media.title: The Relicanth Really Can

media.description: When a Gorebyss-versus-Huntail rivalry develops between two islands, our heroes must get to the bottom of it!
media.title: The Evolutionary War

media.description: The residents of Muscle Island are dedicated to physical fitness—but can they keep up with Ash in a Pokémon battle?
media.title: Training Wrecks

media.description: After a rescue at sea, our heroes find themselves aboard Team Magma's submarine and learn more about the group's plan for world domination!
media.title: Gaining Groudon

media.description: Team Aqua and Team Magma have awakened the ancient Legendary Pokémon Groudon and Kyogre! Can Ash and friends escape?
media.title: The Scuffle of Legends

media.description: A Team Rocket strike on Mossdeep City drags our heroes—plus the city's twin Gym Leaders—into a space-shuttle scheme!
media.title: It's Still Rocket Roll to Me

media.description: Ash takes on the Mossdeep Gym, going up against two Gym Leaders at once!
media.title: Solid as a Solrock

media.description: After winning his seventh Gym badge, Ash can't stop bragging about his battle skills…until he runs into a member of the Elite Four!
media.title: Vanity Affair

media.description: In an island nature preserve, Ash and friends come face to face with several Pokémon thought to be extinct!
media.title: Where's Armaldo?

media.description: May competes in a Pokémon Contest, where another Coordinator tries to sabotage her performance!
media.title: A Cacturne for the Worse

media.description: When our heroes discover an enormous Poké Ball on an island, Team Rocket's meddling unleashes an ancient destructive force!
media.title: Claydol Big and Tall

media.description: Ash and friends meet a talented Trainer who performs a ribbon dance with her Mawile…until Team Rocket gets in the way!
media.title: Once in a Mawile

media.description: To help a local researcher, our heroes explore a massive underground labyrinth created by a group of Trapinch…and get into some trouble along the way!
media.title: Beg, Burrow, and Steal

media.description: An Absol appears to warn a village of danger, but the villagers think it's the one causing the trouble! Can our heroes clear up this misunderstanding?
media.title: Absol-ute Disaster

media.description: When a mischievous Snorunt steals Ash's hard-earned Gym badges, Ash chases after it—right into a raging snowstorm!
media.title: Let It Snow, Let It Snow, Let It Snorunt!

media.description: Max finds an injured Ralts and tries to get it to a Pokémon Center, but its friends Gardevoir and Kirlia think our heroes are trying to steal it!
media.title: Do I Hear a Ralts?

media.description: Ash gets ready for his final Gym battle in the Hoenn region: a Double Battle against Gym Leader Juan, who used to be a Pokémon Coordinator!
media.title: The Great Eight Fate!

media.description: Ash and Juan battle it out in the Sootopolis Gym! Can Ash win his eighth Gym badge to qualify for the Hoenn League?
media.title: Eight Ain't Enough

media.description: When May discovers that two of her Poké Balls are missing, she naturally assumes it's Team Rocket! But the culprit could be someone else entirely…
media.title: Showdown At Linoone!

media.description: When Team Rocket interrupts a practice battle between May and her rival Drew, our heroes and their Pokémon have to sort out a big mix-up!
media.title: Who, What, When, Where, Wynaut?

media.description: Our heroes are delayed by a herd of Donphan on their way to Pacifidlog Town! Can May make it onto the ferry in time for her final Pokémon Contest?
media.title: Date Expectations

media.description: May enters the Pacifidlog Contest, where she goes up against rivals Joshua and Erica, plus a mysterious competitor known only as "The Jester"…
media.title: Mean With Envy

media.description: May competes against an unusual Meowth in the second round of the Pacifidlog Contest. Can she win the last ribbon she needs to qualify for the Grand Festival?
media.title: Pacifidlog Jam

media.description: When our heroes stumble upon a wonderful berry harvest, May takes the opportunity to make some Pokéblocks for the Grand Festival, drawing the attention of a hungry Munchlax!
media.title: Berry, Berry Interesting

media.description: Ash meets Morrison, another Trainer who's on his way to compete in the Hoenn League, and the two immediately become fierce rivals!
media.title: Less Is Morrison

media.description: Aboard a luxury liner bound for Slateport City and the Grand Festival, our heroes must help Officer Jenny catch a master thief!
media.title: The Ribbon Cup Caper!

media.description: On the first day of the Grand Festival, May runs into her deceitful rival Harley once more!
media.title: Hi Ho Silver Wind!

media.description: Ash meets a Coordinator whose ribbons have been stolen, and May listens to some bad advice before her first performance in the Grand Festival!
media.title: Deceit and Assist

media.description: May is up against Harley in the second round of the Grand Festival! Can she triumph over his treacherous tactics?
media.title: Rhapsody in Drew

media.description: When our heroes win free tickets to Ever Grande City for the Hoenn League Championships, they're delighted—until it becomes clear this is another of Team Rocket's schemes!
media.title: Island Time

media.description: While training for the Hoenn League, Ash meets fellow Trainer Tyson and his Meowth in boots, and they discover that the ceremonial torch has been stolen!
media.title: Like a Meowth to a Flame

media.description: Ash, Morrison, and Tyson register for the Hoenn League, and it appears that Tyson's Meowth has an unfortunate past…
media.title: Saved by the Beldum

media.description: In the qualifying rounds, Ash faces a serious challenge: he has to win three matches in a row, and each match is a Double Battle!
media.title: From Brags to Riches

media.description: Ash has made it through the qualifying rounds, but now he faces an impressive Trainer named Katie in a full battle, where both of them will use all six of their Pokémon!
media.title: Shocks and Bonds

media.description: Ash has fallen behind in his full battle against Katie! Can he recover and make it to the second round?
media.title: A Judgment Brawl

media.description: Ash faces his friend and rival Morrison in the second round of the Hoenn League!
media.title: Choose It or Lose It

media.description: Ash goes up against his rival Tyson in the quarterfinals of the Hoenn League!
media.title: At the End of the Fray

media.description: The Hoenn League is over, and it's time for Ash to bid farewell to his traveling companions and head home—but he can't resist one more challenge from a Gym Leader along the way!
media.title: The Scheme Team

media.description: Max and May come to visit Ash in Pallet Town, along with Misty and Brock, and they all make plans for another journey together—this time, to the Battle Frontier!
media.title: The Right Place and the Right Mime

media.description: Our heroes stop for a picnic at the base of Mt. Moon, where they encounter the rarely seen Cleffa, Clefairy, and Clefable!
media.title: A Real Cleffa-Hanger

media.description: On the way to Ash's first match at the Battle Frontier, our heroes see the Legendary Pokémon Articuno flying through a snowstorm!
media.title: Numero Uno Articuno

media.description: Ash calls in his old friend Charizard to help in his battle against Frontier Brain Noland and his friend Articuno!
media.title: The Symbol Life

media.description: Provoked by Team Rocket, hordes of Rock-type Pokémon attack our heroes on their way to the Battle Arena!
media.title: Hooked on Onix

media.description: Ash and friends fall into a trap set by a man who wants to catch a Jigglypuff for his daughter's birthday!
media.title: Rough, Tough Jigglypuff

media.description: May and her rival Drew go after the same Arcanine, both hoping to catch it for their next Contest!
media.title: On Cloud Arcanine

media.description: Ash and friends rescue a sad Psyduck from a group of Fighting types, but they can't figure out how to cheer it up…
media.title: Sitting Psyduck

media.description: Our heroes and Team Rocket check out a new restaurant owned by two sisters who can't stop squabbling!
media.title: Hail to the Chef!

media.description: After a scientific experiment goes awry, Ash and friends try to track down a Caterpie that has grown to enormous proportions!
media.title: Caterpie's Big Dilemma

media.description: Our heroes are in Saffron City for May's first Pokémon Contest in the Kanto region—and her shady rival Harley is competing, too!
media.title: The Saffron Con

media.description: The Saffron Pokémon Contest is under way! Can May win her first ribbon in the Kanto region?
media.title: A Hurdle for Squirtle

media.description: Ash checks out the Fighting Dojo in Saffron City and ends up getting recruited as a new student!
media.title: Pasta la Vista!
